Oh ok

I would suggest you buy a better laptop eventually, but not right now. You can easily finish first, and maybe even second year with this laptop. If you are in AIML, it is beneficial to have an Nvidia GPU on your laptop, but it is not a must (there are workarounds). Wait for a year, by then you will realise your interests, what kind of hardware is required etc and you will be able to make a more informed decision.

See it depends on what you are doing, but you can always get the RAM and storage upgraded. That's what I did. I have Dell with i5, 8th Gen, 12GB RAM (previously was 8GB, but got upgraded recently along with SSD).
See if you can get it upgraded instead of investing in a new laptop, it would save your money
But apparently u need graphic card fron 2nd year for some subjects
I suggest you ask the same question in Btechtards as well. It has a more significant community response than the PESU sub
